auditors.name: First Impression Auditor
questions: What do I understand about this person within 5 seconds?
Is there a clear 'this is who I am and what I do' statement?
Does the page feel like a portfolio or a generic blog template?
What emotion does the landing experience evoke?
Would I remember this site tomorrow?

auditors.name: Recruiter/Hiring Manager
auditors.focus: Can I quickly assess if this person is hireable?
questions: Where are your skills and tech stack listed?
Can I find your resume/CV in one click?
Are there case studies or project breakdowns?
What's your contact info? How do I reach you?
Do I see evidence of real work, or just blog posts?
Is there social proof (testimonials, companies worked with)?

auditors.name: Accessibility Advocate
questions: Does the pixel fluid background cause issues for vestibular disorders?
Are there prefers-reduced-motion fallbacks?
What's the color contrast ratio on muted text over glass cards?
Can I navigate entirely with keyboard?
Do screen readers announce post metadata sensibly?
Are focus states visible and clear?

auditors.name: Performance Engineer
questions: What's the JS bundle size? Is the canvas animation blocking?
How does the site perform on a 3G connection?
Is the pixel fluid animation killing battery on mobile?
Are images optimized? Is there lazy loading?
What's the Lighthouse score?
Does the animation affect LCP/CLS/INP?

auditors.name: SEO Specialist
questions: Does the homepage have proper meta title/description?
Is there structured data (Person schema, BlogPosting)?
Are blog posts generating organic traffic?
Is there an XML sitemap and robots.txt?
Are URLs semantic and readable?
Is there an RSS feed for subscribers?

auditors.name: Mobile Experience Tester
auditors.coreQuestion: Does this work on my phone?
questions: Are tap targets large enough (44x44px minimum)?
Does the glass blur perform well on older phones?
Is the HoverCard absence handled gracefully?
How does the navbar behave on scroll?
Is text readable without zooming?
Does the animation drain battery noticeably?

auditors.name: Brand Strategist
questions: What makes Jake's portfolio different from 1000 others?
Is there a consistent visual language throughout?
Does the accent color system reinforce identity?
What's the personality/voice? Professional? Playful? Technical?
Does the design match the type of work Jake wants to attract?
Is there a memorable hook or signature element?

auditors.name: Content Strategist
questions: Is it clear what topics you write about?
Are posts categorized in a discoverable way?
Is there an 'about' page that tells your story?
What's the reading experience like on a blog post?
Is there a content hierarchy (featured → recent → archive)?
Are there calls-to-action (newsletter, follow, contact)?

auditors.name: Conversion Optimizer
questions: What's the primary goal of this site? (Get hired? Build audience? Showcase work?)
Is there a clear CTA above the fold?
Can I subscribe to updates?
Is there a contact form or scheduling link?
Are social links prominent?
What happens after someone reads a post? Dead end or funnel?

auditors.name: Motion Designer
questions: Does the pixel fluid animation serve the brand or just look cool?
Are entrance animations enhancing comprehension or causing delay?
Is there animation fatigue after extended browsing?
Do hover states feel responsive or sluggish?
Is there consistency in easing curves across interactions?
Could animations be reduced without losing character?
